original_text: And she said, “Who would have said to Abraham that Sarah would nurse children? Yet I have borne him a son in his old age.”
korean_text: 또 이르되 사라가 자식들을 젖먹이겠다고 누가 아브라함에게 말하였으리요마는 아브라함의 노경에 내가 아들을 낳았도다 하니라

sentences.original_text: “Who would have said to Abraham that Sarah would nurse children?
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함에게 누가 사라가 자식을 젖먹이리라고 말하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Yet I have borne him a son
